title: Dealing with a friend who always cancels
context: Aggressively call out your friend who bails on plans at the last second.

content.bestLine: You always bail on me, what's going on?

neutral.text: I feel like we never hang out
You cancel a lot, is everything okay?
I'm starting to think you're not interested
Can we find a time that works for both of us?
I'm getting frustrated with the last-minute cancellations
Let's make a plan and stick to it
I value our friendship, but this is getting old
Can you give me a heads up if you need to cancel?

informal.text: Dude, you always flake on me
What's up with you always canceling?
You're always bailing, it's getting annoying
You're killing me with these last-minute cancellations
Can you just commit to something for once?
I'm starting to think you're not a reliable friend
Let's make a plan and actually follow through

rude.text: You're the flakiest person I know

slang.text: You're always ghosting me, what's good?
